title: sye
description: A web application that provides users with the ability to explore and practice data structures and algorithms through a curated list of problems while offering the unique feature of inviting friends to join them.

title: MakeYourList
description: a user-friendly platform that empowers Spotify users to curate personalized playlists.Users can pick their favorite songs from their existing playlists and assemble them into new, custom playlists

title: Backtracking Visualizer
description: an HTML-based web application designed to visualize the backtracking algorithm's application in solving Sudoku puzzles.

title: Taskboard
description: a web application for effortlessly managing tasks and keeping your to-do list organized.This application is built with ReactJs

title: Calculator
description: This Android application, provides users with a convenient calculator.Users can perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division by tapping on buttons

title: TestCasesGenerator
description: a tool for generating various types of testcases for programming purposes. The tool provides three main functions: generating random strings, generating random arrays, and specifying test case parameters.

title: Cinestream
description: an application built using the Streamlit library in Python. It offers the ability to search for top-rated movies and displays details about the selected movie, including its poster and IMDb rating

title: recommend-anime
description: a web-based Anime Recommender System.It allows users to select their favorite anime from a list and then provides recommendations based on their choice.

title: pingpong
description: a classic game of Pong implemented in Python using the Turtle graphics library
